org.apache.hadoop.hive.shims

Class HadoopShimsSecure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.shims.HadoopShimsSecure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HadoopShims
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hadoop23Shims

    public abstract class HadoopShimsSecure
extends Object
implements HadoopShims
    Base implemention for shims against secure Hadoop 0.20.3/0.23.

      • checkFileAccess

        public void checkFileAccess(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus stat,
                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsAction action)
                     throws IOException,
                            AccessControlException,
                            Exception
        Description copied from interface: HadoopShims
        Check if the configured UGI has access to the path for the given file system action. Method will return successfully if action is permitted. AccessControlExceptoin will be thrown if user does not have access to perform the action. Other exceptions may be thrown for non-access related errors.
        Specified by:
        checkFileAccess in interface HadoopShims
        Throws:
        IOException
        AccessControlException
        Exception

      • addDelegationTokens

        public abstract void addDelegationTokens(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                         org.apache.hadoop.security.Credentials cred,
                                         String uname)
                                  throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: HadoopShims
        Get Delegation token and add it to Credential.
        Specified by:
        addDelegationTokens in interface HadoopShims
        Parameters:
        fs - FileSystem object to HDFS
        cred - Credentials object to add the token to.
        uname - user name.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurred on adding the token.
